name: Lovd
headline: It's not used, it's Lovd.
description: Buy and sell previously Lovd goods. We'll pick up and deliver in 24 hours. Only in NYC.

founders.name: Noah Elion, Founder
founders.description: I like recommending products to friends.

# Make $2,000+ per month dropshipping high-margin tech on eBay
Lovd is the #1 place to dropship used goods. US product only. 3 day fulfillment. Fully vetted, automated and compliant.
[Start Free Trial](http://www.lovd.com/<http:/marketplace.lovd.com/auth/signup>)
Thank you! Your submission has been received!
Oops! Something went wrong while submitting the form.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63cf14f1a9fa811cb34540bb/63ef901b8cede9caccb23651_Vector%20\(1\).svg)
Free 14 day trial
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63cf14f1a9fa811cb34540bb/63ef903695fff33f0757c2ef_1f680%201.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63cf14f1a9fa811cb34540bb/63ef9080d60b3e08873287fe_Group%201540.svg)
# Dropship used goods with zero upfront cost
Lovd is the #1 place to dropship used goods
[Start Free Trial](http://www.lovd.com/</sign-up>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63cf14f1a9fa811cb34540bb/63d1d85a92817f34d036e398_Group%201505.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63cf14f1a9fa811cb34540bb/63d1d816e729947f0db8c479_Group%201539.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63cf14f1a9fa811cb34540bb/63d1d83f8e3cac0ab7785d19_Group%201268.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63cf14f1a9fa811cb34540bb/63d6d35a30313d3eb646a854_Group%201540%20\(1\).svg)
As Seen in
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63cf14f1a9fa811cb34540bb/63f4cb7288bf5eeb1838ee91_Group%201698.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63cf14f1a9fa811cb34540bb/63f4cabb403c5c9755b320e1_Y-Combinator---New%202.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63cf14f1a9fa811cb34540bb/63f4ca97296bc6e15e9f2190_Forbes_logo_black%202.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63cf14f1a9fa811cb34540bb/63f4ca68308dec6e858607c9_61d87893d6ecc0290c8323ea_techcrunch%20gray%201.png)
Built on eBay
## Lovd is on eBay so you can start selling today.
Add products to your eBay account with one-click. Tracking numbers are uploaded automatically. Shipments are sent automatically. No upfront product costs.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63cf14f1a9fa811cb34540bb/63d1dead804661d8e9c66604_Group%201336.svg)
Built on eBay
Use the system you’re used to
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63cf14f1a9fa811cb34540bb/63d1df03804661e6bac66a0a_Group%201337.svg)
One-click profit
Add products with one-click
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63cf14f1a9fa811cb34540bb/63d1dda9e2874a1d3233dfa0_Group%201563.svg)
Features
## Actionable analytics for your business.
Lovd is the #1 dropshipping platform for high-margin used goods.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63cf14f1a9fa811cb34540bb/63efa833bd8fec5f357bf517_Group%201696.svg)
### Best quality products
Lovd suppliers are vetted, high-end resellers with millions in sales on eBay, Amazon and their own stores.
Learn More
![Arrow Left - Saasy Webflow Template](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63cf14f1a9fa811cb34540bb/63cf14f1a9fa817e1a454151_arrow-post-card-saasy-template.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63cf14f1a9fa811cb34540bb/63efa8a49781ba02b33f908b_Group%201697.svg)
### Sell with ease
When an item is purchased our suppliers will send the item directly to your customers.
Learn More
![Arrow Left - Saasy Webflow Template](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63cf14f1a9fa811cb34540bb/63cf14f1a9fa817e1a454151_arrow-post-card-saasy-template.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63cf14f1a9fa811cb34540bb/63efa8e02659b069dd7f546a_Group%201335.svg)
### Zero upfront cost
Start your side hustle with zero upfront cost.
Learn More
![Arrow Left - Saasy Webflow Template](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63cf14f1a9fa811cb34540bb/63cf14f1a9fa817e1a454151_arrow-post-card-saasy-template.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63cf14f1a9fa811cb34540bb/63efa911e1f2b27dd7e158fe_Group%201695.svg)
### High-margin inventory
Easily search for and sell high-margin inventory that is new to dropshipping markets.
Learn More
![Arrow Left - Saasy Webflow Template](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63cf14f1a9fa811cb34540bb/63cf14f1a9fa817e1a454151_arrow-post-card-saasy-template.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63cf14f1a9fa811cb34540bb/63efa9625c911c7af10f67f0_Group%201320.svg)
### One simple app
Lovd integrates directly with eBay so finding and reselling products can be set up in 5 minutes without any code.
Learn More
![Arrow Left - Saasy Webflow Template](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63cf14f1a9fa811cb34540bb/63cf14f1a9fa817e1a454151_arrow-post-card-saasy-template.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63cf14f1a9fa811cb34540bb/63efa98ab7ee5e0f00dd0e09_Group%201321.svg)
### Super fast delivery
Lovd suppliers are all US based with best in-class fulfillment and shipping operations.
Learn More
![Arrow Left - Saasy Webflow Template](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63cf14f1a9fa811cb34540bb/63cf14f1a9fa817e1a454151_arrow-post-card-saasy-template.svg)
Pricing

Our Clients
## Hear what our lovely clients say!
Don’t take our word for it, take theirs. Discover how Saasy has helped tens of companies.

Mobile App
## Browse your analytics & reports on the go!
Browse all analytics reports, user profiles, and much more in our mobile app. It’s free, and full-feature packaged to help you on the go.
[![App Store - Saasy Webflow Template](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63cf14f1a9fa811cb34540bb/63cf14f1a9fa81b547454168_button-app-store-saasy-template.svg)](http://www.lovd.com/<https:/www.apple.com/ios/app-store/>)[![Google Play - Saasy Webflow Template](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63cf14f1a9fa811cb34540bb/63cf14f1a9fa81890045416c_button-google-play-saasy-template.svg)](http://www.lovd.com/<https:/play.google.com/store>)

Integrations
## List your products where people are shopping used.
[![Shopify](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63cf14f1a9fa81ca954540e5/63d265207580582be2d106c2_download%20\(1\)%201.png)Resell on your own Shopify store with one-click. Included in the starter subscription.ShopifyComing soon](http://www.lovd.com/<#>)
[![eBay](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63cf14f1a9fa81ca954540e5/63d266770022e2ea9a2099fe_ebay-logo-black-transparent%201.png)Resell on eBay, the largest used goods marketplace. Included in the pro and business subscriptions.eBayComing soon](http://www.lovd.com/<#>)
[![Amazon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63cf14f1a9fa81ca954540e5/63d2669bd7e5a2c48a04e05a_Amazon_icon%201.png)Resell on Amazon used or renewed. Amazon is the largest e-commerce site in the US.AmazonComing soon](http://www.lovd.com/<#>)

FAQs

generated_description:
**Lovd: The Future of Recommerce in NYC**

**Overview**  
Founded in 2019 and part of Y Combinator Batch W21, Lovd is a New York-based company that transforms the way people buy and sell used goods. With just a small but efficient team of four, they’re on a mission to change perceptions about second-hand items—it’s not used, it’s Lovd. You can check them out at [lovd.com](http://www.lovd.com).

**What They Do**  
Lovd specializes in dropshipping pre-owned goods, providing a platform that connects sellers with customers conveniently. They promise fast pick-up and delivery within 24 hours, exclusively in New York City. This service is especially appealing for those looking to enter the e-commerce space with minimal risk and investment.

**Key Features**  
1. **Seamless eBay Integration**: Users can list and sell products on eBay in just one click, with automatic tracking and shipping services.
2. **Zero Upfront Costs**: You can start dropshipping without the burden of inventory costs.
3. **Quality Assurance**: Lovd's suppliers are vetted and consist of high-end resellers with a strong track record in online sales.
4. **Actionable Analytics**: Lovd provides powerful analytics to help users optimize their business strategies effectively.

**Pricing Plans**  
Lovd offers a variety of pricing plans suited for different user needs:
- **Starter Plan**: Free to explore the platform.
- **Pro Plan**: $30/month for those ready to scale with up to 25 products.
- **Enterprise Plan**: $50/month for unlimited products and robust support options.
- **Wholesale Plan**: $10/month designed for wholesale buyers.

**The Takeaway**  
Lovd is not just another dropshipping service; it’s a strategic entry point for anyone looking to capitalize on the burgeoning market for resale and second-hand goods. Their model is geared toward minimizing barriers for new sellers and capitalizing on the growing demand for sustainable shopping practices.

If you've been thinking about starting a dropshipping business or just want to explore the world of second-hand goods, now's the time to give Lovd a closer look. Start your free trial at [lovd.com](http://www.lovd.com) and see what the future of e-commerce can hold for you!
